english.segment1: May our homes be filled with dancing. May our streets be filled with joy. May in justice bow to Jesus. As the people turn and pray
english.segment2: [Chorus]. From the mountain to the valley. Hear our praises rise to You. From the heavens to the nations. Hear the singing fill the air
english.segment3: May our light shine in the darkness. As we walk before the cross. May Your glory fill the whole earth. As the water over the seas
english.segment4: [Chorus]. From the mountain to the valley. Hear our praises rise to You. From the heavens to the nations. Hear the singing fill the air
english.segment6: [Chorus]. From the mountain to the valley. Hear our praises rise to You. From the heavens to the nations. Hear the singing fill the air
